name: DigitalEyes
description:
You play as one of the last standing humans in an effort to collect samples of human data in a visibility-limited maintenance gondola in a brutalist dystopia. 

Using your 4 security cameras, you will have to manually survey your environment before taking action.

Turn-based Horror

DigitalEyes is a proof-of-concept, atmospheric horror game that emphasizes turn-based gameplay. There are a total of 10 levels and a completionist's playthrough averages at about 1 hour.

Point-and-click Gameplay

This game was made for the 8-Bits to Infinity "Mouse Jam 2", and uses no keyboard input throughout the entire game.
